text: Rajabhau Dattatraya Paranjpe (; 24 April 1910 - 9 February 1979), known as Raja Paranjape (), was an Indian actor, director, producer and writer in the Marathi film and Hindi film industries. He started to produce Marathi films under the banner named Gajraj with Madgulkar and Phadake. The super-hit Hindi film, Mera Saaya, was a remake of his Marathi film, Pathlaag. ==Career== In a career spanning 40 years, Paranjape was associated with about 80 Marathi and Hindi films. ===Films as director (29 titles)=== ===Films as actor (20 titles)=== ==References== ==External links== * * https://web.archive.org/web/20130424005744/http://www.rajaparanjapepratishthan.org/index.html * https://www.flickr.com/photos/rashid_ashraf/43991175431/in/dateposted/ Category:Male actors in Marathi cinema Category:Marathi film directors Category:Male actors in Hindi cinema Category:1910 births Category:1979 deaths Category:20th-century Indian male actors Category:People from Sangli district Category:Marathi film producers Category:Marathi screenwriters Category:Film producers from Maharashtra Category:Film directors from Maharashtra Category:20th-century Indian film directors Category:20th-century Indian screenwriters
title: Raja Paranjape
